docs.lead_paragraph: At the close of the fourth day of the killing heat, in which 31 more deaths were reported in this city and about 220 more over the entire country, the welcome announcement came from the Government forecasters in Washington last night that the hot wave is breaking.

headline.main: 31 DEAD HERE; RELIEF IN SIGHT; Weather Bureau Holds Out Hope of a Break in the Hot Wave by Friday.

docs.snippet: At the close of the fourth day of the killing heat, in which 31 more deaths were reported in this city and about 220 more over the entire country, the welcome announcement came from the Government forecasters in Washington last night that the hot...

docs.lead_paragraph: A LITTLE bit of a shaver stood on the scales in the Board of Health Building last week being weighed. "Seventy-eight pounds," said the man in charge of the scales, and he took him over to the child labor agent.

headline.main: RUSES OF THE WILY YOUTHS WHO WANT WORKING PAPERS; How They Try to Pull the Wool Over the Eyes of the Agent at the Board of Health to Qualify for the Necessary Certificate.

docs.snippet: A LITTLE bit of a shaver stood on the scales in the Board of Health Building last week being weighed. "Seventy-eight pounds," said the man in charge of the scales, and he took him over to the child labor agent.
